gemini-2.5-pro.description: Gemini 2.5 Pro - State-of-the-art multipurpose model for coding and complex reasoning (using long context pricing for safety)

gemini-2.5-flash.description: Gemini 2.5 Flash - Fast and efficient model (using long context pricing for safety)

gemini-2.5-flash-exp.description: Gemini 2.5 Flash Experimental (using long context pricing for safety)

gemini-2.5-flash-lite.description: Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite - Lightweight and cost-efficient model (using long context pricing for safety)

gemini-pro.description: Gemini Pro - Legacy general purpose model

modelFamilyPatterns.description: Gemini 3 Pro variants - best multimodal understanding and agentic model family
Gemini 2.5 Pro variants - next generation advanced model family
Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite variants - lightweight and cost-efficient model family
Gemini 2.5 Flash variants - next generation fast model family
Gemini 2.0 Pro variants - advanced reasoning model family
Gemini 2.0 Flash variants - latest fast model family
Gemini 1.0 Pro variants - legacy model family

notes: Pricing is per 1M tokens as of November 2025
Gemini models use input and output tokens in API responses
Gemini 3 Pro Preview is the most advanced model with best multimodal understanding
Some models have tiered pricing based on prompt length (<=200k vs >200k tokens)
Currently using long context pricing (>200k tokens) for all models as conservative estimate
Future updates may implement dynamic pricing based on actual prompt length
Gemini 2.5 series models support both standard and batch processing
Gemini 1.5 models are deprecated and no longer supported
Gemini 2.0, 2.5, and 3.0 series are the current generation models
Experimental models may have different pricing when generally available
Batch processing and other optimizations may affect final pricing
Legacy models (1.0 Pro, Pro) are marked as deprecated
